newsitem.title: USA: Landry's Seafood preliminary Q3 shr $0.23.
newsitem.headline: Landry's Seafood preliminary Q3 shr $0.23.

text.p: Landry's Seafood Restaurants Inc said Monday that its consolidated third quarter earnings should be about $0.23 per share before merger expenses.
Consolidated revenues should be more than $64 million, the company said.
Landry's, which completed its acquisition of Bayport Restaurant Group Inc in August, said its earnings for the year-ago quarter were $0.17 per share.
The company did not provide an estimate of merger expenses. It said it would release third quarter results by November 6.
